altTitles.en: The Person I met in the game was actually My Big Sister.

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

title.en: A Story About An Office Lady Who Ends Up Looking After A Clingy Delinquent High School Boy She Met at an Arcade

altTitles.ja: OLがゲーセンで会ったヤンキー男子高校生に懐かれる話

altTitles.ja-ro: OL ga Gesen de Atta Yankee Danshi Koukousei ni Natsukareru Hanashi

description.en:
Office lady Haru frequents the arcade daily to distract from her discontent with her company. There she easily crushes a delinquent high school boy in a game and somehow, he becomes attached to her. From acquaintances who just met at the arcade to gaming buddy, and beyond that, their relationship is...!?

A heart-pounding and heart-warming exchange between an office lady and a delinquent high school boy begins!
description.ja:
OLのハルは、会社の不満の憂さ晴らしにゲームセンターに通う日々。
そこでヤンキー男子高校生をボコボコに負かしてしまうが、なぜか懐かれてしまう。

ゲームセンターで会うだけの知り合いからゲーム仲間、そしてさらに二人の関係は…! ?
OL×ヤンキー高校生の胸キュン&微笑ましい交流が始まる!

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-shall-master-this-family/info)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

altTitles.ja: 銭っ子

description.en: A little-known classic, brought to you by the mangaka of Dokaben and Abu-san and the creator of Apache Baseball Team, Zenikko is a gritty look at money and capitalism, and one kid’s attempts to game the system in his favour.

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru

altTitles.ja: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuitenai Game jikkyousha wa akogare no hito ni kakin sareru

description.en:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"

altTitles.ja: 指先に恋を咲かせて

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

altTitles.ja: Chichi to Higegorira to Watashi

altTitles.en: Dad, the Beard Gorilla, and I
Dad, the Bearded Gorilla, and I
Papá, el Gorila Barbudo, y Yo

altTitles.ja: 父とヒゲゴリラと私

description.en: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.
description.zh:
开心的日子也好，寂寞的日子也好，都是大家大家珍贵的回忆。
在同一屋檐下，哥哥+弟弟+哥哥的女儿‼ 一部有点不寻常的家庭喜剧‼

description.en: Mismatched lovers Eunsung and Hyunwoo face a bizarre twist of fate. When Hyunwoo abruptly ends their relationship, Eunsung finds himself committing the darkest of crimes. However, Eunsung wakes up in a world where the cold body in his arms isn’t Hyunwoo’s and instead, he’s the one who's been killed… In this surreal switch, Eunsung realizes a chilling truth—their destinies are entwined in a dark cycle of love and murder. Despite this deadly paradox, Eunsung still believes they are meant to be together, and this time he won’t let anything get in his way…

altTitles.vi: Sơn Ca Yêu Kiều Của Yêu Tinh

altTitles.ja: 優しい夜叉の鳥

altTitles.th: ท่านภูตใจดีกับนกไนติงเกล

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

altTitles.ja: 無知な彼女の◯◯年後…

description.en: An ignorant friend of a certain thirsty(?) wife.

In the office, Taejoon reigns supreme as the "Cupid of Sales," renowned for successfully pairing colleagues thanks to his ability to see the color of people's auras. Unfortunately, he himself has been single his entire life. But everything changes when he drunkenly kisses the new recruit, Hongyeon, which leads to a sizzling night at a motel. And then Taejoon discovers something fascinating - Hongyeon's aura is a mesmerizing rainbow! As Hongyeon boldly pursues him, Taejoon's shyness clashes with their steamy connection. Now they must navigate a somewhat clumsy and spicy office romance, where colors will fly in more ways than one!

Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

Crystal Rotary.

She was the youngest daughter of the Rotary family and a fragile girl who did not come out of the annexe due to her weakness.

Her true identity was male.

Only women were kept alive in the family, and men either become corpses or heirs.

Crystal’s only goal was to leave the Rotary family and live a normal life.

In order for him to survive, he grew up as a daughter. He held his breath like a dead person.

He was finally about to leave, what did they mean, get married?

Crystal, driven into a corner, proposed marriage to Grand Duke Pentrine, who was politically at odds with the Rotary family.

Crystal thought the Grank Duke would refuse, of course, but he got a reply instead. 

Crystal escaped to the Great Castle of Pentrin.

He was a cold northern master, a cruel man, and a man with an icy heart.

Crystal met the rumoured Ellian Pentrin.

And got married. What happened?

***

“You don’t have to be so nervous. I won’t do anything to you.”

On their first night as a couple, Crystal was told that the consummation was not going to happen.

‘What does this mean? Are you saying we’re going to break up?’

Ellian whispered at a distance where his breath could reach only him.

“I’m sorry, my Lady… Because I am a eunuch.”

Ellian Pentrin said in the sweetest voice in the world.

title.en: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

altTitles.ja: お茶目な奥さんとの日常茶番事
とある奥さんの様子

altTitles.en: The State of a Certain Wife

description.en:
I had a one-night stand with my boss?!
Jian Yoo is an editor at a fashion magazine. She frantically ran to Paris after hearing that her boyfriend is two-timing.
Not knowing better, she made a rash decision to sleep with a stranger she had just met there…
Three months later, the editor-in-chief of Jian’s company flew in from their headquarters in France. However, that man…. turned out to be the one Jian spent the night with!!
description.ko:
하룻밤을 같이 보낸 그 남자가 내 상사라고?!
패션지 의 에디터 유지안. 그녀는 약혼자의 양다리 소식에 무작정 파리로 떠난다.
그곳에서 우연히 만난 남자와 충동적으로 하룻밤을 보내 버리고…
3개월의 시간이 흐른 후, 지안의 회사에 만렙의 편집장이 프랑스에서 오게 된다. 그런데 그 남자… 바로 지안과 하룻밤을 보낸 프랑스에서의 그 남자다!!
description.vi: Tôi đã có tình một đêm với sếp của mình ?! Jian Yoo là biên tập viên của một tạp chí thời trang. Cô rất hay chạy đến Paris sau khi nghe tin bạn trai của mình ngoại tình. Không biết làm gì hơn, cô ấy đã quyết định ngủ với một người lạ mà cô ấy mới gặp ở đó…Ba tháng sau, tổng biên tập của công ty mà Jian làm việc bay đến từ trụ sở chính của họ ở Pháp. Tuy nhiên, người đàn ông đó…. hóa ra là người mà Jian đã qua đêm cùng!!

altTitles.ja: ザ・ファブル

description.en:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?

Tired of being picked on, Yeongha, the new transfer student, decides to fight back… and discovers he can pack a punch. He soon becomes the top of the food chain, savoring his new title as the toughest guy at school. But he meets his match when Suho Kang, the Champion of the PVP games, single-handedly takes down him and his crew. To earn back his honor, Yeongha decides to join the PVP games. Will he finally get the satisfaction of beating Suho up? Or will he gain something more?
description.tr: Okula yeni transfer olan Yeongha, sürekli olarak kendisinin ve arkadaşlarının zorbalığa uğramasından bıkmıştı. Bu duruma karşı koymak için kararlılıkla harekete geçti ve kendi elinin ne kadar ağır olduğunu keşfetti. Kısa sürede, okulda ki herkesi ezerek en güçlü çocuk ünvanının tadını çıkardı. Ancak PVP oyunlarının şampiyonu Suho Kang, onun ve ekibinin karşısına tek başına çıktığında, Yeongha gerçek gücünün sınırlarını anlamak zorunda kaldı. Onurunu ve Ünvanını geri kazanmak için PVP oyunlarına katılmaya karar veren Yeongha, sonunda Suho’yu yenmeyi başarabilecek midir?

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

title.en: Ore ga Inma-jutsu de Dorei Harem wo Tsukuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 俺が淫魔術で奴隷ハーレムを作る話

description.id: “Touya”, yang meninggal secara tak terduga, mendarat di dunia fantasi yang dahsyat di mana malaikat, manusia, dan iblis berbaur. Terlebih lagi, sebagai imbalan untuk bertahan hidup di dunia ini, raja iblis memerintahkan dia untuk mengumpulkan kekuatan sihir di dunia manusia. Namun, pada saat yang sama, dia bisa mendapatkan "sihir Succubus" dengan kemungkinan tak terbatas dan iblis "Noel" sebagai pelayannya. Touya dan yang lainnya diam-diam mulai hidup di dunia manusia. Saat tinggal bersama, Noel membuka hatinya kepada Touya, dan keduanya menghabiskan hari-hari mereka menggunakan sihir Succubus untuk bertemu dalam mimpi. Namun, meski dia mencoba mengumpulkan kekuatan sihir dengan memaksa malaikat dan manusia untuk tunduk, sepertinya tidak berhasil.

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.

title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less!
Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.pt-br:
Época Natalina.

Hasegawa Yuuta se viu solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltavam apenas alguns dias para o Natal! Depois de uma conversa normal com sua amiga Mino Ayaka, Yuuta conheceu uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - em uma rua cheia de casais!

Seu nome era Shinohara Mayu. Será que esse encontro com Shinohara será o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

altTitles.ja-ro: Sasayaku you ni Koi o Utau

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う

altTitles.pt-br: Sussurrando Uma Canção De Amor Para Você

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

description.en:
“What?! I'm supposed to be the guardian of this tentacle monster?"
In a research facility specializing in monster biology, Monster Veterinarian Doha finds himself under a slimy assault from a pubescent tentacle monster.

During this encounter, the tentacle monster comes to recognize Doha as its 'maternal figure,' and he ends up becoming its guardian for a year, taking on the responsibility of its training.

However, controlling this tentacle monster, which has an insatiable sexual appetite, proves to be nearly impossible on his own. Eventually, for safety reasons, he is introduced to Kyunghwan, the son of the research facility's director, as his partner.

"Dr. Yoo, if it's okay with you… May I assist with the training?"

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31).

A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? 
Let's stay tuned!

altTitles.ja: さいくるびより

description.en: Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
description.pt-br: Psych House--uma casa especial para aqueles com poderes sobrenaturais. Certo dia, Nemuru, um garoto com uma Psico que lhe permite alterar tamanhos, convida Kotone, uma garota com Psico de teleporte, para viver na Psych House. Agora começam os dias misteriosos, mas ainda normais, daqueles com poderes psíquicos!

description.en: The Demon Neuro has a raging hunger for ‘mysteries.’ Being dissatisfied with his current regime in hell, he’s come into the mortal realm in order to satiate his ever-growing appetite. The murder case of a young girl’s father seems to be sufficiently enticing for the Demon’s needs.. But what else might happen between these two? Find out in this disturbingly good murder-mystery series.

description.en: Saint Seiya: Next Dimension - The Myth of Hades, also known as simply Next Dimension, is an ongoing manga written and illustrated by Masami Kurumada. It is a prequel and continuation to his manga series Saint Seiya; placed during the previous "Holy War" between the deities Hades and Athena and their respective minions, the Specters and the Saints, during the 18th century in the franchise's fictional chronology. It is published by Akita Shoten in the weekly magazine Weekly Shōnen Champion at irregular dates. It is also known by its alternate subtitle Galaxy Myth (銀河神話 Ginga Shinwa?), which is used during publication to refer to the segments of the storyline set in the 20th century, as opposed to the Myth of Hades subtitle, which refers to the segments set in the 18th century.
description.pt-br: Continuação direta de Saint Seiya (Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco). Em 1990, em Elysium, os cinco Saint's (Cavaleiros), Seiya, Hyoga, Shun, Shiryu e Ikki estão lutando contra o deus Hades. Durante a batalha, Hades começa lembrando que ele tenha visto o rosto de Seiya antes e chega à conclusão de que ele enfrentou antes, e assim começa a história... Athena para tentar ajudar Seiya que foi ferido nessa batalha pela espada sagrada de Hades, volta para o passado com a ajuda de Crhonos o Titã do Tempo, para tentar destruir a espada mas as coisas não saem bem como ela queria...

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: 神殺しの模倣使い

description.en:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!

description.en:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.
